original_title: Work of Art! A Reality TV Special, Falling in Love with Chris and Greg
overview: Falling in Love… is a situation comedy about a gay odd couple, one liberal, one radical; one transgender, one not. They don’t have a whole lot in common, but somehow they manage. In this episode, Chris and Greg compete on a reality television show to be “The Next Great Artist.” The challenge: “Create a successful piece of queer art about failure.” Can they make it through a double elimination?
title: Work of Art! A Reality TV Special, Falling in Love with Chris and Greg
